'''''A Tale of Tales''''' is a concept studio album by [[InfuseR]] released on 1 November 2025. Drawing inspiration from the professor's vast work and crafted in an English modern epic metal style, the album merges symphonic textures with power-metal energy to tell a sweeping narrative across ten tracks.
